text.section:
Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, a public service company shall file with the Commission:
an annual report for the preceding calendar year; and
special reports, information, contracts, records, and copies as required by the Commission.

Unless otherwise directed by the Commission, a public service company is not required to comply with subsection (a) of this section if the public service company is:
a common carrier; or
a telephone company whose rates are not regulated by the Commission under Title 4 of this article.
The Commission may require a public service company that files documents under subsection (a) of this section to file the documents under oath.
